thag1.34:1.1_0: It's always better for a smart person
thag1.34:1.2_0: to avoid sharing a seat with such women.
thag1.34:1.3_0: I went from the village to the wilderness;
thag1.34:1.4_0: from there I entered a house.
thag1.34:1.5_0: Though I was there to be fed,
thag1.34:1.6_0: I got up and left without taking leave.
